content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I have a big garden in my yard and I love to plant flowers.
That's so cool! I used to have a small garden when I was a kid but I haven't had one since I moved out on my own.
Oh my gosh I love gardening so much! I could spend hours out there just tending to my plants and flowers.
Me too! It's so relaxing and rewarding to see your plants grow and bloom.
I know right! It's so satisfying when you finally get to harvest your fruits and vegetables.
Exactly! I love the feeling of knowing that you grew something from seed to harvest.
Oh that's a tough one! I love all flowers but I think my favorite would have to be roses.
Roses are beautiful! I love the way they smell.
Me too! They're so fragrant and beautiful.
I have a few rose bushes in my garden.
That's so cool! I wish I could have a garden again.
You should! It's so much fun
